name: SCP - Factory's Last Day
description:
Sometimes, falling asleep in one place, you can find yourself in a completely different...

This is a demo version.
The full version will be released in a year.
But you can support me to get the full game out earlier :)

Be careful, there are sudden loud sounds in the game.

Controls:

WSAD - Move

X - Move Slowly

LShift - Sprint

LCtrl - Crouch

RMB - Interact/Take Physical Object + Move Mouse Up/Down - Interact With Levers

LMB - Drop Physics Object

MMB - Scope

TAB - Note

Recommended System Requirements:

Intel Core i-3 4130

GTX 960(2 GB)

RAM: 8 GB

Storage: 6 GB

Contacts:
